channel.title: AutoCacheDownloader Unzipping Issue
channel.description:
So, I am making a custom webclient for my server. I am using DeathlyPvpz V4 as my source and client. I have renamed my cache folder in signlink.java, and changed the download link in cachedownloader.java. I have also compressed my cache in a .zip file and uploaded it to Dropbox. However, when I try to run my client, it downloads all of the cache, then gives me this error. If this helps at all, this is my Cachedownloader.java - http://pastebin.com/v9y62i9Q and this is my Signlink.java - http://pastebin.com/knmdzmZi
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/28pmyt.jpg[/img] And this is what it actually downloaded.
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/280p475.jpg[/img]
Edit: If I extract CridCacheV1 manually (shown in the second picture), the client works fine.
So apparently it's not extracting the cache correctly? If anyone knows how to fix this, any help would be much appreciated. Thanks so much!

item.title: AutoCacheDownloader Unzipping Issue
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

I’ve got the same issue. Using a similar client base as well.

cache.zip       66687883
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\HorizonXcache\Data\Animation\flo.dat (The system cannot find the path specified)
        at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method)
        at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at CacheDownloader.unzip(CacheDownloader.java:219)
        at CacheDownloader.unZip(CacheDownloader.java:176)
        at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:78)
        at client.startUp(client.java:8135)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
        at client.run(client.java:5583)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\HorizonXcache\data.dat (The system cannot find the file specified)
        at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
        at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at NamedArchive.getBytesFromFile(NamedArchive.java:63)
        at NamedArchive.<init>(NamedArchive.java:10)
        at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4333)
        at client.startUp(client.java:8166)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
        at client.run(client.java:5583)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at client.preloadModels(client.java:903)
        at client.startUp(client.java:8182)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
        at client.run(client.java:5583)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Error: loaderror Connecting to update server 60

Can anyone help?

Read full topic
